Original: 「...おい! おい!」<CF><D1>...? だれかが ぼくの 名前を<CD>よんでる...ぼくの 名前...
Translated: ...Hey! Hey...!<CF><D1>...? <D3>Someone's calling my name...<CF>My name...

Original: ...あれ? ぼくって そんな<CD>名前だったっけ? まあ いいや
Translated: ...<D3>Is that what my name was?<CF>Well, whatever.

Original: <@LL,00,06>あれ? あれ?<CD>今 ぼく もしかして ねてた?
Translated: <@LL,00,06>Huh...? what was that? <D3>Was I asleep just now?

Original: <@LL,00,06>そっ そうだ!<CD>「週刊メダロット」はじまった?
Translated: <@LL,00,06>Th-that's right! <D3>Has <f02>Medarot Weekly<f00> started yet?

Original: <@RL,35,00>まだだぜ まったく<CF><D1>テレビ貝ながら いしき<CD>とんでんじゃね-よ<CF><D1>アタマ どうかしてるんじゃね-か?<CF><D1><@LL,00,02>お前なぁ! マスタ-に むかって<CD>その口の ききかたは ないだろっ!<CF><D1><@RL,35,00>マスタ-? じょうだんだろ<CF><D1>オレは まだ みとめた わけじゃ<CD>ね-からな!<CF><D1><@LL,00,02>いったい いつになったら<CD>そ-ゆ-たいどが なおるんだよ!<CF><D1><@RL,35,00>さぁな
Translated: <@RL,35,00>It's not on yet. Jeez...<CF><D1>All you do is stare at the TV<D3>and turn your brain off.<CF><D1>Are you messed up in the head<D3>or something?<CF><D1><@LL,00,02>Hey!! That's no way to<D3>talk to your master!<CF><D1><@RL,35,00>You? Master? Yeah right!<CF><D1>I don't remember ever<D3>agreeing to that.<CF><D1><@LL,00,02>Just how long are you gonna<D3>keep up that attitude?<CF><D1><@RL,35,00>Beats me.

Original: <@RL,36,00>まだだ<CD>貝れば わかるだろう<CF><D1>テレビを 貝ているのかと 思えば<CD>いねむリとはな<CF><D1>しゅうちゅうリょくの ないヤツだ<CF><D1><@LL,00,02>お前なぁ! マスタ-に むかって<CD>その口の ききかたは ないだろっ!<CF><D1><@RL,36,00>ふん このおれの マスタ-と<CD>みとめるには お前は まだまだだな<CF><D1><@LL,00,02>いったい いつになったら<CD>そ-ゆ-たいどが なおるんだよ!<CF><D1><@RL,36,00>お前 しだいだな
Translated: <@RL,36,00>It is not on yet. You would<D3>know that just by looking.<CF><D1>I thought you had been<D3>keeping watch on the TV.<D3>But it turns out you were<D3>dozing off.<CF><D1>You lack much focus.<CF><D1><@LL,00,02>Hey!! That's no way to<D3>talk to your master!<CF><D1><@RL,36,00>Hmph, you still have much to<D3>learn before I can consider<D3>calling you my master.<CF><D1><@LL,00,02>Just how long are you gonna<D3>keep up that attitude?<CF><D1><@RL,36,00>That depends on you.

Original: <@RL,12,00>...くしゅんっ!<CF><D1><&BUF03>!<CD>ひまなんでしょ?<CF><D1>おつかい 行ってきてくれない?
Translated: <@RL,12,00>...Achoo!<CF><D1><&BUF03>!<D3>Are you free?<CF><D1>Could you go on an errand<D3>for me?

Original: <@LL,00,05>今じゃないと だめ?<CD>「週刊メダロット」の 時間なんだ<CF><D1><@RL,12,00>ビデオとってるんでしょ?<CD>じゃ いいじゃない<CF><D1><@LL,00,05>ぼくは ちょっとでも 早く<CD>貝たいのに...
Translated: <@LL,00,05>Does it have to be now?<D3>It's time for <f02>Medarot Weekly<f00>!<CF><D1><@RL,12,00>You can just record it, right? <D3>Then you have time for chores!<CF><D1><@LL,00,05>Aww, I wanted to watch <D3>at least a little bit of it...
<@LL,00,04>That's right! Say...<CF><D1><@LL,00,05>Uhm...

Original: <@LL,00,04><&BUF07><CD>行ってきてくれよ<CF><D1>お前 ベつに「週刊メダロット」<CD>きょうみ ないだろ?
Translated: <@LL,00,04><&BUF07>, you can go instead, right?<CF><D1>It's not like you're interested in <f02>Medarot Weekly<f00>.

Original: <@RL,35,00>はぁ? じょうだんじゃないぜ<CF><D1>なんで オレが お前のかわリに<CD>んなことしなきゃ なんね-んだよ
Translated: <@RL,35,00>Huuuh? You're kidding!<CF><D1>Why do I have to do your dirty work?

Original: <@RL,36,00>ふん そんなことを してやる<CD>ぎリは ない<CF><D1>自分で 行くんだな
Translated: <@RL,36,00>I am not obliged to do any of that.<CF><D1>Go do it yourself.

Original: <@LL,00,02>もう あったまきた!<CD>メダロット転送!
Translated: <@LL,00,02>Argh, that's it!!<D3>Medarot Transport!

Original: <@LL,00,05>あれ? あれ?<CD>...おっかしいなぁ はんのうしない
Translated: <@LL,00,05>Huh? What? ...That's weird.<D3>Why isn't it working?

Original: <@RL,35,00>はっはっは! メダロッチまで<CD>お前を貝はなしたようだな!
Translated: <@RL,35,00>Hahaha! Guess the Medarotch<D3>ain't listening to you either!

Original: <@RL,36,00>どうした? メダロッチにまで<CD>貝はなされたか? なさけないヤツだ
Translated: <@RL,36,00>What's wrong? Has your<D3>Medarotch deserted you too?<CF><D1>Pitiful.

Original: <@LL,00,02>ええい! はんのうしろっ!<CD>メダロット転送!
Translated: <@LL,00,02>Come on, work!!<D3>Medarot Transport!

Original: <@LL,00,05>...ふう<CF><D1><@LL,00,02>まったくっ ぼくのメダロッチまで!<CF><D1><@LL,00,06>あ 何のボタンをおしても<CD>はんのうしなく なっちゃった!<CF><D1><@LL,00,05>さいきん なんか<CD>ちょうしわるいよなぁ<CF><D1><@RL,12,01>ちょっと <&BUF03>!<CD>聞いてるの?
Translated: <@LL,00,05>...Phew.<CF><D1><@LL,00,02>Jeez, even my Medarotch is<D3>giving me a hard time.<CF><D1><@LL,00,06>It wouldn't respond no matter<D3>what buttons I pressed.<CF><D1><@LL,00,05>My luck just hasn't been that<D3>great lately...<CF><D1><@RL,12,01>Hey, <&BUF03>!<D3>Are you listening?

Original: <@LL,00,06>あっ はい! ママ<CD>今 行くよ!
Translated: <@LL,00,06>Ah- yes, mom! <D3>I'll go right now!

Original: <@RL,12,00>早く 行ってきてちょうだい
Translated: <@RL,12,00>Go, and get back quickly.

Original: <@RL,12,01>こらっ<CD>2かいで はんせいしてなさいっ!<CF><D1><@LL,00,03>しくしく...
Translated: <@RL,12,01>Unbelievable! Go to your room<D3>and think about what you did!<CF><D1><@LL,00,03>*sniffle*....

Original: <@RL,12,00>ほんとうに パパって<CD><&BUF03>に あまいんだから
Translated: <@RL,12,00>Your father is really <D3>too easy on you, <&BUF03>.

Original: <@RL,12,00>メダロットだけじゃなくて<CD>たまには おやこうこうも してね♥
Translated: <@RL,12,00>Don't only do things for<D3>the sake of Medarots! <CF><D1>Think about your parents,<D3>too. ♥

Original: <@RL,12,01>...くしゅんっ!<CD>ああ くるしいっ<CF><D1>かぜぐすリが ぜんぜん<CD>きかないわ
Translated: <@RL,12,01>...Achoo! Oh, this is horrible!<CF><D1>This cold medicine isn't working<D3>at all.

Original: <@LL,00,00>ママ! そのかぜ<CD>ぼくが なおしてあげる!<CF><D1>スイッチ オン!
Translated: <@LL,00,00>Mom! I'll cure that cold <D3>for you!<CF><D1>Switch ON!

Original: <@RL,12,01>キャ-ッ!!<CF><D1><@RL,21,03>...ロボ?<CF><D1><@LL,00,02>とおくの おやまに<CD>とんで 行けっ!
<@LL,00,04>ママ! かぜの もとは<CD>やっつけたよ!<CF><D1><@RL,12,00>...あら 本当<CD>くしゃみが 止まったわ<CF><D1><@RL,12,02>あリがとう <&BUF03><CF><D1>おれいに 今月の<CD>おこづかい あげるわ
Translated: <@LL,00,04>Mom! I defeated the thing <D3>that was causing your cold!<CF><D1><@RL,12,00>Ah... my sneezing <D3>really has stopped!<CF><D1><@RL,12,02>Thank you, <&BUF03>.<CF><D1>As thanks, here's this<D3>month's allowance.

Original: <@LL,00,01>わ-い!<CF><D1><@RL,12,02>メダロットに つかうのも いいけど<CD>たまには おやこうこうも してね♥
Translated: <@LL,00,01>Yayy!<CF><D1><@RL,12,02>It's fine to spend it on <D3>Medarots, but think of your <CF><D1>parents too sometimes, <D3>okay?♥

Original: <@LL,00,05>...? パパとママ 合わせて<CD>ぼくの 持ってるお金が<CF><D1>4800¥...<CD>何か だまされたような 気分
Translated: <@LL,00,05>...? Dad and mom both <D3>gave me my allowance...<CF><D1>I've got 4800¥...<D3>This kinda feels like stealing...

Original: <@RL,11,00>どうだ?<CD>がんばってるか?
Translated: <@RL,11,00>How's it going? <D3>Are you doing your best?

Original: <@LL,00,00>早く コンビニに 行って<CD>タマゴを 買ってこなくちゃ
Translated: <@LL,00,00>I need to quickly get to <D3>the convenience store <CF><D1>to buy some eggs.

Original: <@LL,00,00>公園に 行って<CD>アリカみたいに とっくん しよう!
Translated: <@LL,00,00>I'll go to the park and train<D3>like Arika is!

Original: <@LL,00,00>早く 家に かえって<CD>タマゴを わたさなくちゃ!
Translated: <@LL,00,00>I need to hurry home<D3>and deliver the eggs!

Original: <@LL,00,00>買いものって 何?
Translated: <@LL,00,00>What do you want from<D3>the store?

Original: <@RL,12,00>...くしゅん!<CD>ああ くしゃみが 止まらないわ<CF><D1><@LL,00,05>ママ かぜ なおらないね
Translated: <@RL,12,00>...Achoo! Aah, my sneezing just<D3>won't stop...<CF><D1><@LL,00,05>Your cold hasn't been<D3>getting any better, mom...

Original: <@RL,12,00>くしゅん!<CD>...そういうわけだから<CF><D1>コンビニ行って タマゴ 買ってきて<CD>きらしちゃったのよ<CF><D1>今 こまかいのが ないから<CD>5000¥ わたすわね
Translated: <@RL,12,00>Achoo!<D3>...That's why,<CF><D1>I need you to run to the store<D3>for some eggs.<CF><D1>I don't have any small bills<D3>on me, so I'll give you 5000¥.

Original: <@RL,12,01>分かってるとは 思うけど<CD>むだづかいしちゃ ダメよ!<CF><D1>...くしゅん!<CF><D1><@LL,00,04>はぁい!
Translated: <@RL,12,01>I'm sure you already know<D3>this by now but,<CF><D1>no spending on anything else!<D3>...Achoo!<CF><D1><@LL,00,04>Okay!

Original: <@LL,00,05>つうしんたんまつ「ミルミル」だ<CD>ここで メダルや パ-ツの<CF><D1>やリとリとか<CD>つうしんロボトルが できるんだ
Translated: <@LL,00,05>This is the communication<D3>terminal, <f02>Mille-Mille<f00>, where I<CF><D1>can trade medals, parts and<D3>even robottle.

Original: <@RL,0A,02>はぁ-い! みんな 元気かなぁ?<CD>わたしは かわいい つうしんギャル♥<CF><D1>この つうしんたんまつ「ミルミル」で<CD>パ-ツや メダルの やリとリとか<CF><D1>お友だちとの つうしんロボトルとかが<CD>できちゃいま-っす!
Translated: <@RL,0A,02>Hello! Is everyone doing okay?<D3>I'm the communication cutie ♥<CF><D1>At this communication<D3>terminal, <f02>Mille-Mille<f00> you can<CF><D1>trade parts, medals, and<D3>robottle your friends!

Original: <@RL,0A,02>それじゃ つうしん いってみる-?<*04>
Translated: <@RL,0A,02>Do you want to link?<*04>

Original: <@RL,0A,02>まったね-♥
Translated: <@RL,0A,02>Ok bye~♥

Original: <@RL,0A,00>ふ-ん やらないんだ-<CF><D1><@RL,0A,02>それじゃ まったね-♥
Translated: <@RL,0A,00>Hmm, you don't wanna?<CF><@RL,0A,02>Ok, see you next time then ♥

Original: <@LL,00,04>フル-ツや デザ-トが ならんでる<CD>どれが いいか まよっちゃうな
Translated: <@LL,00,04>With all these fruits and<D3>desserts, I just can't decide.

Original: <@LL,00,04>フル-ツや デザ-トが ならんでいる<CD>きょうは プリンが いいかな?
Translated: <@LL,00,04>A bunch of fruits and dessert,<D3>should I get a pudding?

Original: <@LL,00,04>フル-ツや デザ-トが ならんでいる<CD>フル-ツの もリあわせも すてがたい
Translated: <@LL,00,04>I just can't get enough of all<D3>these fruits and dessert.

Original: <@LL,00,04>フル-ツや デザ-トが ならんでいる<CD>やっぱリ ヨ-グルトだよな
Translated: <@LL,00,04>All these fruits and dessert,<D3>but yogurt is the way to go!

Original: <@LL,00,04>フル-ツや デザ-トが ならんでいる<CD>ここは ケ-キで きまリだ!
Translated: <@LL,00,04>All these fruits and dessert,<D3>this is the place for cake!

Original: <@LL,00,04>フル-ツや デザ-トが ならんでいる<CF><D1><@LL,00,03>...なんで ぼくは<CD>ここ ばっかリ 貝るんだろう?
Translated: <@LL,00,04>Fruits and dessert are<D3>lined up.<CF><D1><@LL,00,03>...Why do I keep looking here?

Original: <@LL,00,04>ジュ-スが たくさん ならんでる
Translated: <@LL,00,04>Lots of juice is all lined up.

Original: <@LL,00,04>ここには いろんな名前の<CD>面白い おさけがある
Translated: <@LL,00,04>There's all sorts of alcohol <D3>with interesting names.

Original: <@LL,00,04>「ウメしゅ」「カリンしゅ」...<CD>これは ジュ-スでは あリません<CF><D1><@LL,00,07>ええっ!?<CD>カリンちゃんの おさけがあるの!?
Translated: <@LL,00,04><f02>Plum Wine<f00>, <f02>Karin Liqueur<f00>...<D3>This isn't juice...<CF><D1><@LL,00,07>Ehh!? There's a drink named <D3>after Karin!?

Original: <@LL,00,00>もしかして ほかにも...<CF><D1><@LL,00,04>「あまざけ」 <CD>これは アリカの 名字だ!<CF><D1>「しつのよい<CD>こうじを つかっています」<CF><D1><@LL,00,01>コッ コウジまで いる!!
Translated: <@LL,00,00>Maybe there are others...<CF><D1><@LL,00,04><f02>Amazake<f00>,<D3>that's Arika's last name!<CF><D1>"Made with a truly excellent<D3>Kouji malt."<CF><D1><@LL,00,01>K-Kouji is here too!!

Original: <@LL,00,00>ほかには...<CF><D1>「スクリュ-ドライバ-」って ある<CD>これって スクリュ-ズの ことだ!
Translated: <@LL,00,00>There's more...<CF><D1><f02>Screwdriver<f00>, that could be<D3>the Screws!

Original: <@LL,00,00>ぼくの 名前は ないのかなぁ?<CD>「<&BUF03>しゅ」<CF><D1><@LL,00,01>な-んてね
Translated: <@LL,00,00>Is there one named after me?<D3><f02><&BUF03> Liqueur<f00>!<CF><D1><@LL,00,01>Just kidding!

Original: <@LL,00,03>おさけが ならんでいる...けど<CD>おとなになるまで かんけいないや
Translated: <@LL,00,03>There's alcohol lined up here... <D3>but I can't have any until I <CF><D1>grow up.

Original: <@LL,00,04>おいしそうな アイスクリ-ムが<CD>いっぱい 入ってる
Translated: <@LL,00,04>It's full of delicious looking <D3>ice cream.

Original: <@LL,00,04>コピ-の きかいがある<CD>かおを コピ-したら おこられそうだ
Translated: <@LL,00,04>It's a copy machine. <D3>They'll probably get mad if I <D3>copy my face.

Original: <@LL,00,04>やきたての パンが ならんでいる<CD>コンビニなのに やきたてなんだ!
Translated: <@LL,00,04>Freshly baked bread is <D3>lined up here. Even though <CF><D1>it's in a convenience store, <D3>it's still freshly baked!

Original: <@LL,00,04>レトルトしょくひんが たくさん<CD>レトルトかぁ...
Translated: <@LL,00,04>Packaged food, so much<D3>packaged food...

Original: <@RL,0C,01>どうしたんだい?<CD>こっちを じ-っと 貝つめて?<CF><D1>レトルトしょくひんが どうか...<CF><D1><@RL,0C,02>そんなこと<CD>気に しなくていいの!
Translated: <@RL,0C,01>What's wrong?<D3>Why are you staring at me?<CF><D1>Packaged food, huh?<CF><D1><@RL,0C,02>You don't need to be worrying<D3>about me living off of them!

Original: <@LL,00,04>レトルトしょくひんが ならんでる
Translated: <@LL,00,04>Packaged food is lined up here.

Original: <@LL,00,04>いろんな ざっしが おいてある<CD>あっ ボンボンも ある
Translated: <@LL,00,04>All sorts of magazines. Ah,<D3>they have Comic BomBom too.

Original: <@LL,00,00>アルバイト中に テレビなんか<CD>貝てて いいんですか?<CF><D1><@RL,0C,02>いいんだよ<CD>とくに することないしね<CF><D1><@LL,00,00>そんなものですか
Translated: <@LL,00,00>Should you really be watching<D3>TV while you're working?<CF><D1><@RL,0C,02>It's fine.<D3>There's not much for me to do.<CF><D1><@LL,00,00>Is that how things go?
<@RL,0C,02>Ha- ha- ha-<CF><D1><@LL,00,06>W-what?

Original: <@RL,0C,03>はっ.....くしゅんっ!
Translated: <@RL,0C,03>Ha... hachoo!

Original: <@LL,00,00>ヒカルさん!<CF><D1><@RL,0C,02>いやぁ なかなか かぜが<CD>なおらなくてね<CF><D1><@LL,00,00>ヒカルさん! それ<CD>かぜじゃないです!<CF><D1><@RL,0C,00>ヘ?<CF><D1><@LL,00,00>スイッチ オン!
Translated: <@LL,00,00>Hikaru!<CF><D1><@RL,0C,02>Oh my.. this cold just won't <D3>get better...<CF><D1><@LL,00,00>Hikaru! That's not a cold!<CF><D1><@RL,0C,00>Eh?<CF><D1><@LL,00,00>Switch ON!

Original: <@LL,00,02>かぜは 社会の めいわくだっ!!
Translated: <@LL,00,02>This cold is a menace to<D3>society!!

Original: <@RL,0C,00>これは いったい...
Translated: <@RL,0C,00>What on earth was that...

Original: <@LL,00,04>ヒカルさん かぜの ぐあいは<CD>どうですか?<CF><D1><@RL,0C,00>あ くしゃみが 止まってる<CF><D1><@LL,00,04>それじゃ おだいじに!<CF><D1><@RL,0C,00>は? あ うん
Translated: <@LL,00,04>Hikaru! How's your cold?<CF><D1><@RL,0C,00>Ah- my sneezing has stopped.<CF><D1><@LL,00,04>Well then. <D3>Please take care of yourself!<CF><D1><@RL,0C,00>Huh? Y-yeah.

Original: <@RL,0C,02>何だか きつねに<CD>つままれたような 気分だよ
Translated: <@RL,0C,02>I feel like spirits were<D3>playing tricks on me.

Original: <@RL,14,00>じゃまだ!<CD>あっちに 行け!<CF><D1><@LL,00,00>そんなに おこらなくったって...
Translated: <@RL,14,00>You're in the way!<D3>Leave me be!<CF><D1><@LL,00,00>No need to be such a grouch...

Original: <@RL,0C,02>ヘくしっ!...かぜかな?<CF><D1><@LL,00,04>こんにちは ヒカルさん
Translated: <@RL,0C,02>Hachoo! ...Am I getting sick?<CF><D1><@LL,00,04>Hi, Hikaru.

Original: <@RL,0C,02>やあ <&BUF03>くん<CD>いらっしゃい<CF><D1>...ヘくしっ!
Translated: <@RL,0C,02>Ah, <&BUF03>, welcome!<CF><D1>...Hachoo!

Original: <@LL,00,05>かぜですか?<CD>さいきん はやってますね<CF><D1><@RL,0C,01>ところで おつかいかい?<CF><D1><@LL,00,00>あ はい<CD>タマゴは...<CF><D1><@RL,0C,00>おくの たなに おいてるよ
Translated: <@LL,00,05>Is it a cold? People have<D3>been catching them lately...<CF><D1><@RL,0C,01>By the way, are you<D3>on an errand?<CF><D1><@LL,00,00>Um, yeah. For eggs...<CF><D1><@RL,0C,00>They're on the shelf, you know.

Original: <@RL,0C,02>おいおい <&BUF03>くん<CD>タマゴを 買うんじゃないのかい?
Translated: <@RL,0C,02>Hey wait a minute <&BUF03>!<D3>Aren't you buying eggs?
